pullRequest.title: #17918 Indicies stats type was changed from int to long to support bigger values
pullRequest.bodyText: Type values were modified to support bigger values. It was failing for large datasets. A couple of tests were implemented to verify both types (int and long) are supported

commit.message: #17918 Indicies stats type was changed from int to long to support bigger values
